catalog_info.title: Human Developmental and Regenerative Biology
catalog_info.notes: M., W., F., at 1, and a weekly section to be arranged This course, when taken for a letter grade, meets the General Education requirement for Science of Living Systems.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Concurrent enrollment in Life and Physical Sciences A or Life Sciences 1a.
catalog_info.description: Fundamental concepts in developmental biology will be presented within the framework of the developing and regenerating mammal. Where possible, lectures will focus on humans.
